Body:
It’s springtime and Kai hears the familiar sound of baby chicks coming from his family’s chicken coop in the back yard. Kai
decides it’s time for a parade of the new chicks. Display the chicks in a row based on the number of chicks in the data file.
Input: The input will consist of a single integer N (1 <= N <= 10) representing the number of chicks to display in the parade.
Output: The given parade of chicks in the form as shown below.
